long_description: The Swiss-Tech Micro-Light smartphone stand offers both a flashlight and a stand for your smartphone in 1 handy unit. Simply disconnect the stand from your key chain, flip open the arm and place your phone on the stand vertically or horizontally for hands-free video calling or viewing. LED flashlight features a pushbutton light switch that doubles as a nonslip pad when used as smartphone stand. The Swiss-Tech Micro-Light smartphone stand comes with 2 replaceable CR1616 batteries.
short_description: The Swiss-Tech Micro-Light smartphone stand offers both a flashlight and a stand for your smartphone in 1 handy unit.
